animeTitle: Pokemon Movie 18 Special: Pikachu to Pokemon Ongakutai
otherNames: ポケモン・ザ・ムービーXY『ピカチュウとポケモンおんがくたい』
synopsis: As with previous Pokémon films, a short will run alongside the main film, and the poster for the short features Pikachu, Meowth, and Dedenne. The title of the short will be revealed later.
